attributes.action: Change TV Licence to Subscription for EXAMPLE BritBox,Netflix,Prime,Sky...!!!?
attributes.additional_details: Because 21st century is all Subscription service take SKY for example I pay and I get a service where as with a tv Licence I dont get any sort of service
attributes.background: Make the tv licensing come update with the 21st century why should I pay for tv licence when I pay for BritBox which is own by the bbc

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Hold a binding referendum on the future of the TV licence.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587212
